August 11, 1942, No.PA.g46 H.B.M. *8 iblitical Agent, Bahre in. Dear Sir, f I enclose four copies, arranged serially, of each of the following Royalty Delivery Tickets R.848-B to R.864 both inclusive. These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from Tanks Nos.152 and 153 to the Refinery and include Arabi Crude run frcm Zellaq., which has been computed on the following Royalty Delivery Tickets, four sets of each being enclosed Z.2013 to Z.2036 both inclusive. The difference between the totals of these two sets of Royalty Delivery Tickets represents the total gross amount of Crude Oil upon which the Royalty for July 1942 will be accrued. We also enclose three extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. Yours faithfully, --7 W.P. Date 16th August *942 The Political Agent, Bahrain, presents his compliments to ; — The Adviser to thn Government of Bahrain, Bahrain -. and has the honour to transmit to him the undermentioned document (s) A Reference to previous correspondence This Agency Printed Letter No•1291—28/6 dated 21st July, 1942 y i No. & date of enclosure Subject Royalty on oil for July 1942, - Delivery tickets for<(B cO- v 0 the Bahrein Petroleum Company limited /Or- 'No. PA-43 4, A w a 1 i f Bahrein Island, Persian Gulf. September 19, 1942. CI 6 H.B.M, *3 Political Agent, Bahrein, Dear ^ir, I enclose four^Optes, arranged serially, of each of the following Royalty Delivery Tickets R.86L5 to R.876-A, both inclusive. These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from Tanks Nos.152 and 153 to the Refinery and include Arabian Crude run from Zellaq, which has been computed on the follov/ing Royalty Delivery Tickets, four sets of each being enclosedl - Z,2037 to Z,2096, both inclusive. The difference between the totals of these two sets of Royalty Delivery Tickets represents the total gross amount of Crude Oil upon which the Royalty for August 1942 will be accrued. We also enclose three extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. Yours faith W. P. ANDERSON, CHI3F LOCAL RSPRSSWTATIVS, THIS BAHREIN P2TR0L31M COMPANY UMITSD. ROYALTY TICKETS I^ear Sir, I enclose four copies, arranged serially, of each of the following Royalty Delivery Tickets R.876-B to R.889-A, both inclusive. These tickets represent the total aimunt of Crude Oil run fron Te.nks Nos.152 and 153 to the Refinery and include Arabian Crude run from Zellaq, which has been computed on the following Royalty Delivery Tickets, four sets of each being enclosed Z.2097 to Z.2175, both inclusive. The difference between the totals of these two sets of Royalty Delivery Tickets represents the total gross amount of Crude Oil upon which the Royalty for September 1942 will be accrued Deliveries. iTe also enclose three extra copies of the Summary of Oil Yours faithfully W. P. ANTERSON, CHIEF IDCAL REPRESENTATIVE, THE BAHRAIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED. CGB/tvw End;A W B 1 i, October £0, 1942. Subject Royalty on oil for Septorber, 19^2 — Delivery tickets for* >>• O A ■'**^ cP the bahrein petroleum company limited A w a 1 i, Bahrein Island. Persian Gulf. No.PA-550 Political Agent, Bahrein. November 14, 1942, ROYALTY TICKETS Dear Sir, I enclose four copies, arranged serially, of each of the following Royalty Delivery Tickets R.889-B to R.900, both inclusive. i These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from Tanks Nos.152 and 153 to the Refinery and include Arabian Crude run from Zellaq, which has been computed on the following Royalty Delivery Tickets, four sets of each being enclosed Z.2176 to Z.2232, both inclusive. The difference between the totals of these two sets of Royalty Delivery Tickets represents the total gross amount of Crude Oil upon which the Royalty for October 1942 will be accrued. We also enclose three extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. W. P. ANDERSON, CHI3F LOCAL REPRESENTATIVE, THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED. HtV 1 November, I94a The Political Agent, Bahrain, presents his compliments to : — Th« adviser to the Government of Bahrain, Bct hraln* and has the honour to transmit to him the undermentioned document (s) Reference to previous correspondenoe This Agency Printed Letter Ne•1894-28/6, dated 26th October,1942 No. & date of enclosure Subject Royalty on eil for October - delivery tickets forsV- *0° the bahrein petroleum company limited A w a 1 i, Bahrein Island. Persian Gulf, December 12, 1942. No .PA-6 02 1 H.B # M,♦s Political Agent, Bahrein. Dear Sir, ROYALTY' TICKETS I enclose four copies, arranged serially, of each of the following Royalty Delivery Tickets R.901 to R.913-A, both inclusive. These tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from Tsnks No3.152 and 153 to the Refinery and include Arabian Crude run from Zellaq, which has been computed on the following Royalty Delivery Tickets, four sets of each being enclosed Z.2233 to Z.2298, both inclusive. The difference between the totals of these two sets of Royalty Delivery tickets represents the total gross amount of Crude Oil upon which the Koyalty for November 1942 will be accrued. also enclose three extra copies of the Summary of Oil Deliveries. Yours faithfully ifincl: W..P. ANDSRSON, CHEST LOCAL REPRESENTATIVE, THE BAHREIN PETROLEUM COMPANY LIMITED. P .L. No.2262-28 /5, dated 17 -12-42 issued to :- India office, London. Foreign, Few Delhi. Ihese tickets represent the total amount of Crude Oil run from Tanks Nbs.152 and 153 to the Refinery and include Arabian Crude run from Zellaq, which has been computed on the following Royalty Delivery T ickets, four sets of each being enclosed Z.2299 to Z,2370 both inclusive. February 13» 1943. No.PA-710 ill Vs.' H.B.M.'s political Agent, The political Agency, Manama. Dear Sir» ROYALTY TICKETS I enclose four copies, arranged serially, of each of the following Royalty Delivery Tickets R.928 to R.949 inclusive. These tickets represent the total amount of Crude oil run frcm Tanks Nos.152 and 153 to the Refinery and include Arabian Orude run from Zellaq, which has been canputed on the following Royalty Delivery Tickets, four sets of each being enclosed ;- 2.2371 to Z.2465 inclusive. The difference between the totals^of these two sets of Royalty Delivery Tickets represents the total gross amount of Crude Oil upon which the Royalty for January 1943 will be accrued. We also enclose three extra copies of the ♦nummary of oil Deliveries. Yours faithfully. W. P. location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 28/5 X Monthly statements of oil deliveries: royalty delivery tickets'

physicalDescription.extent: This was a large file and was divided in two equal sections, in order to make it more manageable. Section one contains folios 1-297, while the second section runs from folio 297 to folio 594. The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order.There are notes at the end of the file, (ff. 593-595). The file notes are arranged chronologically and refer to the earliest documents within the file; they give brief description of the correspondence with a reference number, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.
The foliation is circled in pencil, in the top right corner of each folio. The numbering begins with 1 on the first folio, and carries on until 594, on the last folio of the file.

mods.abstract: The file mainly contains Royalty Delivery Tickets showing the amount of oil delivered to refinery from July 1942 to January 1943, transmitted by Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representatives to the Political Agent at Bahrain.
